snippet.title: Bullfighter NEON 🌹 KICKSTARTER TRAILER! 🌹 (STEAM NEXT FEST FEB 2024)
snippet.description:
Funded on Kickstarter!! Thank you so much for your support!


*** Bullfighter NEON ***

Inspired by the “future Cyber-Sport” Arcades of the 90s, Bullfighter NEON is a true retro-future arcade experience, where intense gameplay and frantic action are kings. Jump to the Arena solo or with a friend and face off against mighty cyberbeasts.


* Steam Wishlist *
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1753450/Bullfighter_NEON/

* Twitter *
https://twitter.com/BullfighterNEON


Original Soundtrack Composed by Gryzor87.

The FontStruction “NEOGEO System Font”
(https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/1158061) by “everiux365” is
licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license
(http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).

Bullfighter NEON © Relevo 2021/2022. All rights reserved.
Website: https://www.relevovideogames.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/REL3VO
